@usedefault

{{service domain:$$domain sname:$$sname}}

{{actions:

- display: Start
  action: AYS/serviceaction
  data:
   domain: ${domain}
   sname: $$sname
   instance: ${instance}
   action: 'start'

- display: Stop
  action: AYS/serviceaction
  data:
   domain: ${domain}
   sname: $$sname
   instance: ${instance}
   action: 'stop'
}}
